verse: Listen to this word which I take up for a lamentation over you, O house of Israel.
For Yahweh says to the house of Israel:
Therefore Yahweh, the God of Armies, the Lord, says:
“Did you bring to me sacrifices and offerings in the wilderness forty years, house of Israel?
You also carried the tent of your king and the shrine of your images, the star of your god, which you made for yourselves.
Therefore I will cause you to go into captivity beyond Damascus,” says Yahweh, whose name is the God of Armies.
